entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 11:29AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...HEAVY RAIN INTO THE WEEKEND FOR GULF COAST AND ICY STRAIT CORRIDOR... An atmospheric river has been giving moderate to heavy rain to parts of the northern half of Southeast Alaska. Heavy rain started late Wednesday night near Yakutat, and is expected to slide over the Icy Strait corridor and central gulf coast late Friday.
